scripts.test: npm run test-client && npm run test-client-vuex && npm run test-server && npm run test-server-vuex
scripts.test-client: cross-env NODE_ENV=test mocha-webpack  --require test/setup/setup.js test/setup/client-setup.js test/*.spec.js test/client/*.spec.js
scripts.test-client-vuex: cross-env NODE_ENV=test mocha-webpack --require test/setup/setup.js test/setup/with-vuex.js test/setup/client-setup.js test/*.spec.js test/client/*.spec.js
scripts.watch-client: cross-env NODE_ENV=test mocha-webpack --watch --require test/setup/setup.js test/setup/client-setup.js test/*.spec.js test/client/*.spec.js
scripts.test-server: cross-env NODE_ENV=test mocha-webpack --require test/setup/setup.js test/setup/server-setup.js test/*.spec.js test/server/*.spec.js
scripts.test-server-vuex: cross-env NODE_ENV=test mocha-webpack --require test/setup/setup.js test/setup/with-vuex.js test/setup/server-setup.js test/*.spec.js test/server/*.spec.js
scripts.watch-server: cross-env NODE_ENV=test mocha-webpack --watch --require test/setup/setup.js test/setup/server-setup.js test/*.spec.js test/server/*.spec.js
